Uses of Interface
org.opensaml.xml.security.credential.CredentialResolver

  • Packages that use CredentialResolver 
    Package Description
    org.opensaml.xml.security.credential
    Interfaces and classes related to credentials and ways to represent them.
    org.opensaml.xml.security.keyinfo
    Interfaces and classes for working with XML KeyInfo elements.
    org.opensaml.xml.security.trust
    Interfaces and classes used to evaluate the trustworthiness and validity of Credentials
    org.opensaml.xml.signature.impl
    Implementations of the interfaces for XMLObjects that represent XML signature types.

    • Uses of CredentialResolver in org.opensaml.xml.security.credential

      Classes in org.opensaml.xml.security.credential that implement CredentialResolver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractCredentialResolver
      Abstract base class for CredentialResolver implementations.
      class  AbstractCriteriaFilteringCredentialResolver
      An abstract implementation of CredentialResolver which filters the returned Credentials based on the instances of EvaluableCredentialCriteria which are present in the set of criteria, or which are obtained via lookup in the EvaluableCredentialCriteriaRegistry.
      class  ChainingCredentialResolver
      An implementation of CredentialResolver which chains together one or more underlying credential resolver implementations.
      class  CollectionCredentialResolver
      An implementation of CredentialResolver which uses a Collection as the underlying credential source.
      class  FilesystemCredentialResolver
      NOTE: this class is not yet implemented A CredentialResolver that pulls credential information from the file system.
      class  KeyStoreCredentialResolver
      A CredentialResolver that extracts Credential's from a key store.
      class  StaticCredentialResolver
      Simple implementation of CredentialResolver which just stores and returns a static set of credentials.
      Fields in org.opensaml.xml.security.credential declared as CredentialResolver 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private CredentialResolver ChainingCredentialResolver.CredentialIterator.currentResolver
      The current resolver which is returning credentials.
      Fields in org.opensaml.xml.security.credential with type parameters of type CredentialResolver 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Iterator<CredentialResolver> ChainingCredentialResolver.CredentialIterator.resolverIterator
      The iterator over resolvers in the chain.
      private List<CredentialResolver> ChainingCredentialResolver.resolvers
      List of credential resolvers in the chain.
      Methods in org.opensaml.xml.security.credential that return types with arguments of type CredentialResolver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<CredentialResolver> ChainingCredentialResolver.getResolverChain()
      Get the (modifiable) list of credential resolvers which comprise the resolver chain.

    • Uses of CredentialResolver in org.opensaml.xml.security.keyinfo

      Subinterfaces of CredentialResolver in org.opensaml.xml.security.keyinfo 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  KeyInfoCredentialResolver
      Specialized CredentialResolver marker interface for resolvers which resolve credentials based on a KeyInfo element.
      Classes in org.opensaml.xml.security.keyinfo that implement CredentialResolver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasicProviderKeyInfoCredentialResolver
      Implementation of KeyInfoCredentialResolver which resolves credentials based on a KeyInfo element using a configured list of KeyInfoProvider's and optional post-processing hooks.
      class  CollectionKeyInfoCredentialResolver
      An implementation of KeyInfoCredentialResolver which uses a Collection as the underlying credential source.
      class  LocalKeyInfoCredentialResolver
      A simple specialization of BasicProviderKeyInfoCredentialResolver which is capable of using information from a KeyInfo to resolve local credentials from a supplied CredentialResolver which manages local credentials.
      class  StaticKeyInfoCredentialResolver
      Simple implementation of KeyInfoCredentialResolver which just stores and returns a static set of credentials.
      Fields in org.opensaml.xml.security.keyinfo declared as CredentialResolver 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private CredentialResolver LocalKeyInfoCredentialResolver.localCredResolver
      The resovler which is used to resolve local credentials.
      Methods in org.opensaml.xml.security.keyinfo that return CredentialResolver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CredentialResolver LocalKeyInfoCredentialResolver.getLocalCredentialResolver()
      Get the resolver for local credentials.
      Constructors in org.opensaml.xml.security.keyinfo with parameters of type CredentialResolver 
      Constructor and Description
      LocalKeyInfoCredentialResolver(List<KeyInfoProvider> keyInfoProviders, CredentialResolver localCredentialResolver)
      Constructor.
